Stay’n Charge Success Guide

$24.00

Category: Content
  • Description
  • Additional information

Description

We define success as high performance and balance in six key “batteries.” This guide includes an introduction to each battery, practices and threats to success, a challenge to push you to develop, and a daily journal to monitor your progress. Keep it with you on the go to and use it to turn your dreams into goals with a plan.

Additional information

Weight 9.2 oz
Dimensions 6 × 9 in
